### 1-Create a vector


```{r}
vec_1 <- c(2, 5, 9, 10, 8, 12, 1, 0)

class(vec_1)

typeof(vec_1)

vec_1_e3 <- vec_1 [3]

vec_1_e1 <- vec_1 [1]

vec_1_e5to7 <- vec_1 [5:7] 

vec_1_char <- as.character(vec_1)


```

### 2 Creat a vector 

```{r}
vec_2 <- c(town = "Santa Barbara", location = "Rincon", swell = "south")

class(vec_2)
length(vec_2)

vec_2_e2 <- vec_2["location"]
```

### 3 Create a data frame in R, index
```{r}
region <- c("A", "B", "A", "D")
species <- c("otter", "great white", "sea lion", "gray whale")
count <- c(12, 2, 36, 6)
df_1 <- data.frame(region, species, count)

class(df_1)
class(df_1$species)
maximum_value_count <- max(df_1$count)

```
